content.rendered:
Directed by R. Balki

Written by Swanand Kirkire

Cast Akshay Kumar (Lakshmikant Chauhan). Radhika Apte (Gayatri). Sonam Kapoor (Pari Walia). Jyoti Subhash (Lakshmi’s Mother).Urmila Mahanta. Suneel Sinha (Prof Tejas Walia (Pari’s Father)).Sanjay Singh. Rakesh Chaturvedi Om ((as ‘Om’ Rakesh Chaturvedi)).Mrinmayee Godbole.Mridul Satam.Parul Chauhan .Saurabh Agarwal. Amitabh Bachchan (Self).Varun Bag. Himika Bose (Medical College Student). Riva Bubber (Tinku’s Mother).Gautmik. Amit Ghosh (Watchmen).Chittaranjan Giri.Lalita Goyal. Shriram Jog (Partner and Mentor). Tiffany M. Johnson (UN Ambassador). Faiz Khan (Haria). Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Wasim Khan (Drunk Man).Swini Khara. Ran Levy (UN Ambassador). Zachary Harris Martin (UN Representative).Biju Menon. Aman Singh Mukar (Interpreter). Terri O’Neill (U.N. Representative). Harshada Patil (Pinky). Andreas Pliatsikas (UN Member). Vikash Rajput ((voice)).A.R. Rama. Santosh Rege (Business Partner, Jeetu Bhai). Lalit Salvi (Toy Shopkeeper). Abhimanyu Sarkar (Gayatri’s brother).Amit Sharma. Nandini Shrivastava (Vikreet). Deependra Singh (Watchman). Akash Srivastava (MPTDC-Driver). Gaurri Sukhtankar (News Interviewer (as Gauri Sukhtankar)). Rob Tunstall (UN Ambassador). Soumya Vyas (Lakshmi’s sister). George Zouvelos (United States Diplomat)

Languages Hindi

Producers Jiten Nand Kishor Arora. Harsh Dave. Shailesh Gupta. Arjun N. Kapoor. Hetvi Karia. Twinkle Khanna. Anil Naidu. Santosh Rai. Santosh Rege. Ravi Sarin. Prashant Shah. Chavi Sirohi. Hitesh Thakkar

Production Mrs Funnybones Movie. Hope Production. KriArj Entertainment
